lines.text: We've been bombing cities every day and every night all over the U.S., only people never know it.
Yep, two. One on the ramp, one in the hangar!
Don't tell me about your little problems! I'm only interested in results!

[Seeing General Hawkes speaking to the men on the flight line while smoking a cigar, whispering to Holland]
Sir, that cigar. Doesn't the general know that the aircraft might explode?
